entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
